ygData.subject: Re: simply charming
ygData.msgSnippet: Just an FYI to all you talking about hiving such High Charisma... I really don t think it s to blame for the problem some bards are saying they are having with
ygData.messageBody:
Just an FYI to all you talking about hiving such High Charisma... I
really don't think it's to blame for the problem some bards are saying
they are having with charm. My CHA is only 102, and I regularly charm,
HG, SG, Griffons, etc. I get some resists, but am still able to do it
will confidence that I will win.

If fact, my resist rate is ~50%. (of course once it works it seems
easier the next time). But if my resist rate was 90%, I could still
charm and win. It would take a bit longer i'm sure...

These stats are for soloing, not charming in group tactics. in that
case, a 50% resist rate is bad, possible deadly.

Uldar Ulfangson
35th Bard, Rodcet Nife
